text.name: system_description
text.text: The Nintendo 64DD (Disk Drive) is a peripheral for the Nintendo 64 system released only in Japan. It is connected via the extension port located under the console. It can read magnetic disks. A modem was also used to connect to the network and offered various options such as online gaming and Internet browsing.
